caption: A red truck slowly rolled into an open space and transformed into a towering robot. It gazed at a beam of light in the sky. Meanwhile, a man sat inside a car in an underground garage. His actions were noticed by a security guard. He tried to escape, but the car suddenly sprang to life and sped out of the underground garage, terrifying the man. The car raced through the streets, causing the man considerable distress. It collided with a police car. Finally, in a warehouse, it transformed into a towering robot. Several other robotic beings arrived on the scene, with the red truck turning into one of them, and they collectively lifted the man off the ground.
